name: Daemon Sigil
description:
Your world is under siege! Dark forces have found a way to tap into your portal network putting the village in ultimate peril! Roam the land in search of daemons powerful enough to battle the eldritch invaders and defend your village! Set out to an unknown realm in hopes of closing the last portal!

Build a powerful deck with the daemons you seal on the way!




Navigate a hex grid over-world and choose a strategic path! Explore diverse biomes!





Earn XP after each run! Spent your XP in a roguelite upgrade system!




Explore the world to find all 400+ daemons... behold the strength of a shiny daemon!
